title: Visma-Lease a Bike’s Tour de France ‘Control Room’ Data Vehicle Under Threat from UCI, Just Hours After it Was Launched
content:
UCI puts brain center for Jonas Vingegaard's title defense under scrutiny: 'Our priority is to ensure sporting fairness, equitable access to technology, the primacy of man over machine.'

Read the full article at Visma-Lease a Bike’s Tour de France ‘Control Room’ Data Vehicle Under Threat from UCI, Just Hours After it Was Launched on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
